content: **blooming lily crochet square** **difficulty level | skills required** adventurous beginner to intermediate basic stitches in simple variations simple repeats color changes shaping and finishing you will need to know basic stitches like single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet special stitches explained and provided in the instructions **materials** hook 4 00 mm g scissors yarn needle **yarn ** moya 100% organic cotton dk weight dk 11 wpi 3 light 1312 - 1329 yards 1200 - 1215 m - this is the requirements for the complete cushion 9 x 50g natural x 2 kiwi x 2 butternut x 2 amazon x 2 cherry x 1 **yarn substitute ** using the same type of yarn throughout the project is recommended the pattern suggests dk yarn weight dk 11 wpi 3 light worsted but you are not limited to this type of yarn any yarn can be used if you take into consideration your sizing for the project will differ **gauge | gauge** gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect however counting your stitches will ensure a true success of this project **size** square approx 20 x 20 cm 8 x 8 inches cushion approx 43 cm x 43 cm 16/17 inches x 16/17 inches remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your square/cushion will be a different size **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com
